title: Remote-Based Advanced Mathematics Self-Directed Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Providing a flexible learning environment using digital devices. Strengthening learning opportunities without geographical/time constraints

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of multivariable calculus with over 80% accuracy via the online platform.
Learners make meaningful contributions at least three times in problem-solving projects with peer learners using remote collaboration tools.
Learners autonomously plan and execute self-directed learning for over five hours per week using asynchronous learning materials.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
